title:
Inverse Iteration for the Laplace Eigenvalue Problem with Robin and
  Mixed Boundary Conditions
authors: Benjamin Lyons, Ephraim Ruttenberg, Nicholas Zitzelberger
abstract:
We apply the method of inverse iteration to the Laplace eigenvalue problem
with Robin and mixed Dirichlet-Neumann boundary conditions, respectively. For
each problem, we prove convergence of the iterates to a non-trivial principal
eigenfunction and show that the corresponding Rayleigh quotients converge to
the principal eigenvalue. We also propose a related iterative method for an
eigenvalue problem arising from a model for optimal insulation and provide some
partial results.
